name: Team of 2
description:
Team of 2 is all about teamwork! both characters are in different parts of the level and must press buttons to open doors for the other so they can collect their diamond to reach the next level! Did I mention you control both characters at the same time! There are 5 levels in total!

Controls

* A/D - Move left and right!

* Space - Jump!

Thanks for playing! Any and all feedback is greatly appreciated!
